name: Comet Strike
text:
Void all cards in play, crypts, and hands.

Each champion gains [L0][R10].

Each champion gains 10 [DIAMOND].

Each champion gains 10 [RUBY].

Each champion gains 10 [SAPPHIRE].
flavor: A massive crystalline meteor hit Entrath near its northern terrestrial pole 2300 years ago.

name: Mastery of Time
text:
Take an additional turn after this one.

Void this.
flavor: Do not hesitate. Time never does.

name: Eye of Creation
text: Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Put each revealed troop into play. Put the remaining cards into your deck.
flavor: Titania is the Primal of Wild Magic.
